channel.title: Vintage Synth (Help needed)
channel.description: Well i pulled a Korg PS-3100 out of a skip last year, and cannot find out why the keyboard is not operating properly. Heres a video i made on it... http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wS3nPI0NrfI So yeah, if anyone knows what is wrong then please reply (i dont expect any, as these things are rare, as i believe there were only 600 ever made)

item.title: Vintage Synth (Help needed)
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Yeah, we actually own an origonal manual, and we have printed out the circuit diagram, but from what i can see, there is nothing wrong.
All of the oscilators work, i can get all the right sounds when i configue it right, but nomatter what i do, the keyboard will not change in pitch/tone

Read full topic

item.title: Vintage Synth (Help needed)

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

http://www.korganalogue.net/korgps/manuals/3100/index.html
